headline: PG&E Powers Ahead on Breakthrough Grid Innovation with Dynamic Line Rating, Asset Health Monitoring Demonstration
summary: Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) today announced the successful launch of its Dynamic Line Rating (DLR) and Asset Health Monitoring (AHM) technology demonstration, bringing together advanced sensor technology, real-time analytics, and innovative partner solutions to optimize electric transmission line capacity and proactively monitor asset health.

content.title: PG&E Powers Ahead on Breakthrough Grid Innovation with Dynamic Line Rating, Asset Health Monitoring Demonstration
content.summary: Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) today announced the successful launch of its Dynamic Line Rating (DLR) and Asset Health Monitoring (AHM) technology demonstration, bringing together advanced sensor technology, real-time analytics, and innovative partner solutions to optimize electric transmission line capacity and proactively monitor asset health.

thumbnail.caption: A Heimdall Power Neuron installed on a PG&E electric transmission line in Californiaâ€™s Central Coast region is one of several dynamic line rating technologies PG&E is testing.
